communications.subject: Virginia Freedom of Information Act Request: Presidential Inaugural
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Virginia Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Records of the invitation to or application submitted by VMI for the Corps of Cadets to participate in the upcoming inaugural of President-elect Donald Trump, VMI’s response to any invitation, communications between the VMI leadership and others on participation, and records showing any class, group, or other category of cadets exempt or excused from participating or for whom participation in the inaugural is options with the reason and the approval authority.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Tom Nash, a citizen of Virginia, in coordination with Anonymous.

communications.subject: Virginia Freedom of Information Act Request: NCAA Athlete Retention
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Virginia Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Records of the number of NCAA athlete Cadets by class, by sport, by gender, by race/ethnic background who received scholarships for the past 10 academic years including those currently enrolled in academic year 2024 – 2025 to include the amount per cadet, source of funds, if the cadet graduated, left VMI through the portal, left VMI for disciplinary reasons, or left VMI for other reasons without graduating. Any personally identifying information (PII) or FERPA information identifying the individual can be redacted.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Tom Nash, a citizen of Virginia, in coordination with Anonymous.

communications.subject: Virginia Freedom of Information Act Request: State Cadets
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Virginia Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Records of the number of State Cadets by class, by gender, by race/ethnic background as defined in § 23.1-2506 enrolled in VMI, number graduated, the financial assistance provided, and in what capacity they served their two year obligation after graduation for the past 10 academic years including those currently enrolled in academic year 2024 – 2025. If there were no State cadets in the past 10 years or are currently enrolled, please provide this information for the last 3 years any State Cadets were enrolled at VMI. If this program is no longer active at VMI provide the last year VMI enrolled a State cadet and the records showing why the program stopped, who approved its termination, when, and for what reason including any decision documents, recommendations, etc. Any personally identifying information (PII) or FERPA information identifying the individual can be redacted.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Tom Nash, a citizen of Virginia, in coordination with Anonymous.

communications.subject: Virginia Freedom of Information Act Request: Virginia Military Institute Records retention
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Virginia Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

Records identifying the Virginia Military Institute Records retention officer and all approved records retention and disposition schedules (RM-3, etc.) for the 2020 – 2021, 2021 – 2022, 2022 – 2023, 2023 – 2024 and 2024 – 2025 academic years.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Tom Nash, a citizen of Virginia, in coordination with Anonymous.
